data.name: Caution
data.detailed_description:
Overview


In this game you control a Caution sign, who lived happily doing its job day after day, until one day it was kidnapped, that's when it swore revenge.



This Garbageman became a villain from the moment he messed with the wrong sign, now he will bear the consequences of his actions.



To carry out your revenge, you need to spread garbage throughout the city. All this, as fast as you can. Can you do it?

Features


• 30 levels in 3 scenarios.
• 1 hidden level for each scenario, for a total of 3 hidden levels.
• 1 secret level hidden somewhere in the game.
data.about_the_game:
Overview


In this game you control a Caution sign, who lived happily doing its job day after day, until one day it was kidnapped, that's when it swore revenge.



This Garbageman became a villain from the moment he messed with the wrong sign, now he will bear the consequences of his actions.



To carry out your revenge, you need to spread garbage throughout the city. All this, as fast as you can. Can you do it?

Features

• 1 secret level hidden somewhere in the game.
data.short_description: Caution is a platform game about a caution sign that performs its function masterfully, until a garbageman hijacks it and puts it in a garbage truck. The sign, which in turn, has sworn revenge against the nefarious garbageman.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64bit Microsoft® Windows® 7 SP1, 8.1, 10 (version 1607 or better)
  • Processor: 64bit 1.5 GHz CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 (DirectX® 10) compliant graphics card and driver.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64bit Microsoft® Windows® 10 (version 1607 or better)
  • Processor: 64bit Multi-core 2GHz CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 (DirectX® 10) compliant graphics card and driver.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
